doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes materials from artists, including, among others, Edi Rama, Robert Rauschenberg, Josh Reames, Lilly Reich, Alexis Rockman, Claire Rosen, Mark Rothko, Michael Rovner, Nancy Rubins, Ed Ruscha, and Robert Ryman. Also includes a Weisman Art Museum/Minneapolis Institute of the Arts brochure on the retrospective exhibition, "Ralph Rapson: Sixty Years of Modern Design." Includes a brochure on "Speak, An Exhibition of Work by Ellen Rothenberg." Also includes a Los Angeles County Museum of Art brochure on Susan Rothenberg, including a biography of the artists and several exhibitions.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> R (Set 2)
